original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields closed steady, rupee at 320.30/321.30 against the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT –  Sri Lanka’s bond yields were steady at closed on Tuesday while the rupee opened at 320.30/321.30 against the US dollar, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 closed unchanged at 27.60/28.00 percent from a day earlier.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 closed at 27.00/25 percent, steady from 26.75/27.00 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed at 25.85/26.00 percent, steady from 25.60/80 percent.
The rupee closed at 320.30/321.30 to the US dollar in the spot market depreciated from Monday’s close at 319.75/320 rupees. (Colombo/April18/2023)
